title: Introducing: Alicia Eris
content:
‘My music is not pop.

Be prepared.’ states Alicia Eris (Alicia Randolph) on her Facebook page. To be honest, I’d probably argue against that, but that’s not to say that it’s not absolutely brilliant pop. Eris’s debut single under her new moniker is a soulful, hip-hop inspired number, yet relying upon it’s the slick, upbeat chorus, not too dissimilar to rising star Lolo. Reportedly working with Syd The Kid from Odd Future, Alicia Eris is a name to keep an eye out for. Check out I Moved On below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
